title: Scam & Fraud Protection in {{city_upper}}, FL
headline: Learn to spot scams, stop fraud, and protect yourself before it's too late.
description: Local scam and fraud protection in {{city_upper}}. We help you identify online scams, configure your devices securely, and protect against social engineering and fraud.

sections.heading: Did You Know?
paragraph: Scammers now use AI-generated voices, spoofed caller IDs, and fake websites to impersonate family members, banks, and tech support.
Social engineering works because it targets emotions, not firewalls. You don't need to be hacked to be tricked.
Many scam attempts bypass antivirus software entirely and rely on human error to succeed.

sections.heading: What We Do
items: Teach you how to recognize scams by phone, email, and web with real examples
Secure devices used by seniors or vulnerable users with hardened settings
Block scam domains, dangerous links, and known phishing infrastructure
Set up call filtering, email rules, and safe browsing protections
Help investigate and respond to suspicious messages or compromised accounts

sections.heading: How It Works
sections.paragraph: We review your devices, walk through real-world scam tactics, and show you exactly how they work. Then we configure protections tailored to your household and help you build habits that keep you safe.
